title.rendered: CapMan Real Estate acquires logistics development project in Mölnlycke

content.rendered:
CapMan Real Estate, through the CapMan Nordic Real Estate III fund, has entered into an agreement to acquire a brownfield logistics development project in Mölnlycke, a prime logistics hub in the Nordic region, from Mitsubishi Logisnext Europe AB.

Together with operating partner and real estate developer Panattoni, CapMan Real Estate will develop the project by demolishing outdated industrial buildings on the site and constructing a modern, EU taxonomy-aligned logistics facility of approximately 43,000 sqm, which is expected to be completed by summer 2026. The development project, with a focus on sustainability and waste recycling, is targeting a BREEAM-SE v.6 New Construction certification of at least level Excellent and an energy performance certificate rating B.

The acquisition, which is expected to close in the first quarter of 2025, is the sixth Swedish investment for the CapMan Nordic Real Estate III fund and further strengthens CapMan Real Estate’s presence in the Swedish logistics market.

CapMan Real Estate was advised by Mannheimer Swartling in the transaction.
